name: Commandoak
description: Introducing Commandoak, your macOS app for streamlined command execution! Define your commands with emojis and names, then effortlessly execute them in a new, interactive default Terminal window right from the menu bar.

features.title: Command Shortcuts
features.description: Define terminal commands with names and emojis, and execute them with a single click from the menu bar or using keyboard shortcuts. Commands open in a new, interactive Terminal window.

features.title: Modern Frameworks
features.description: Built in Swift with modern frameworks like SwiftUI and SwiftData, ensuring a responsive and efficient user experience.

features.title: Auto-start on Login
features.description: Commandoak can be configured to start automatically when you log in to your Mac by registering a helper application.

features.title: CI/CD
features.description: The application is automatically built using Xcode on GitHub Actions. The workflow creates a new release for each version after a successful build. Application code is linted using SwiftLint in a CI pipeline.
